title: CN Level 10 — Secure Web Application Networking
intro: This level combines networking and basic security for web apps.
points: Understand typical web deployment: browser → Internet → load balancer → app servers → database.
Use HTTPS (TLS) to secure data in transit.
Place firewall or security groups around subnets.
Use DMZ/VPC subnets to separate public and private components.
Consider rate limiting, WAF (web application firewall) and logging.
